text: When building is selected, fully hide the menu.
protected_text: When building is selected, fully hide the menu.
translated: 当选择构建时，完全隐藏菜单。

text: When enabled, the mod will remember the last selected subcategory for each main category. When disabled, it will always default to the first subcategory.
protected_text: When enabled, the mod will remember the last selected subcategory for each main category. When disabled, it will always default to the first subcategory.
translated: 启用后，模组将记住每个主类别最后选择的子类别。禁用后，它将始终默认为第一个子类别。

text: Whether the menu should use subcategories for each material, or be more broadly sorted. (WIP)
protected_text: Whether the menu should use subcategories for each material, or be more broadly sorted. (WIP)
translated: 菜单是否应该对每种材料使用子类别，或者进行更广泛的排序。 （开发中）

text: There is nothing available to build yet.
protected_text: There is nothing available to build yet.
translated: 目前尚无任何可构建的内容。
正在加载更好的架构师...

text: Optional edit-mode tools for customizing parent/child categories and designator layout.
protected_text: Optional edit-mode tools for customizing parent/child categories and designator layout.
translated: 用于自定义父/子类别和指示符布局的可选编辑模式工具。

text: Checked parent categories are visible. Uncheck to hide from Architect tabs.
protected_text: Checked parent categories are visible. Uncheck to hide from Architect tabs.
translated: 选中的父类别可见。取消选中可从 Architect 选项卡中隐藏。
重置所有编辑模式覆盖
所有编辑模式设置均已重置。

text: Reset designator overrides for selected category
protected_text: Reset designator overrides for selected category
translated: 重置所选类别的指示符覆盖
添加可构建或特殊指示符

text: Manage Hanging Decorations such as signs, banners and curtains.
protected_text: Manage Hanging Decorations such as signs, banners and curtains.
translated: 管理悬挂装饰，如标牌、横幅和窗帘。

text: Things that help you generate your power.
protected_text: Things that help you generate your power.
translated: 帮助您产生力量的事物。

text: Things that help you store power.
protected_text: Things that help you store power.
translated: 帮助你储存能量的东西。

text: Things that help you manage your power.
protected_text: Things that help you manage your power.
translated: 帮助您管理权力的事物。

text: Build conealed buildings for surprising your enemies.
protected_text: Build conealed buildings for surprising your enemies.
translated: 建造圆锥形建筑，让敌人大吃一惊。
为你的敌人建造基础设施。
让你的殖民者冷静下来。

text: Things that relate to burials or memorials.
protected_text: Things that relate to burials or memorials.
translated: 与墓葬或纪念馆有关的事物。
管理相关的殖民地位置。
